apps.name: Spotify++
apps.subtitle: Spotify with free premium.
apps.localizedDescription:
Spotify++ essentially activates spotify premium on your device with one exception: No downloads.

So what does Spotify++ change?

• All kinds of ads removed
• Unlimited skips
• Play any song or album
• Enable extreme streaming quality
• No forced shuffle
• Import songs from the Music app

permissions.usageDescription: This lets you scan Spotify Codes.
This lets you save and select images to and from your Photo Library.
Used to control your tempo for Spotify Running.
This lets you control Spotify using your voice.
This lets you use Spotify with external accessories.
This lets you set access restrictions using Face ID.

apps.name: Cercube
apps.subtitle: An elevated YouTube experience.
apps.localizedDescription:
YouTube is one of the best and most popular video-sharing platform available on the web. It features a range of videos from funny pranks to reviews, gaming content, and daily vlogs by popular influencers.

YouTube also offers an app for iOS which provides a more smooth and enjoyable experience watching videos on your iPhone. Unfortunately, the app lacks a lot of essential features.

Cercube is a third-party app for YouTube that brings tons of amazing new features and functionality. Some of these are:

• Download and save videos up to 4k resolution
• Save videos as audio only
• View, manage and share all your downloads in Cercube's download manager
• Block ads
• Share downloaded videos with other devices via AirDrop
• Background playback for streamed and downloaded videos
• Import downloads to Music or Videos
• Play YouTube videos using Picture-in-Picture mode
• Downloaded videos are displayed within a beautifully crafted downloads manager that shows all the available information
• Choose the default tab to open when launching YouTube
• Stream videos in HD on cellular network
• Auto-replay videos
• Hide floating upload button
• Hide the Trending tab
• Rewind or forward videos
• Cercube options are configurable from within YouTube settings
• Play in high quality on Mobile Data

And many more features. All-in-all, Cercube takes your YouTube experience to a whole new level with all the innovative features that it provides.

permissions.usageDescription: This lets you upload videos you've already created.
Your contacts will be sent to YouTube servers to help you find friends to share videos with.
This lets you include audio with your videos and search using your voice.
Makes it easier for you to attach location information to your videos and live streams and allows for features such as improved recommendations and ads.

apps.name: UTM
apps.subtitle: Any OS, Anywhere.
apps.versionDescription:
New Features

• Pause/resume VM
• Restart VM
• Auto-save state on background and/or low memory warning
• Preferences page for controlling auto-save and gestures
• Configure gestures (change two finger tap, long press, etc)
• Save display position/zoom automatically

Bug Fixes

• Add delay in mouse up and key up events fixing broken cursor/keyboard in PPC/aarch64/others (#145)
• Fix pasting long text (#151)
• Rare crash due to texture buffer not being locked correctly (#23)
• Fix issue of PPC QEMU trying not supporting QXL
apps.localizedDescription:
UTM is a full featured virtual machine host for iOS. In short, it allows you to run Windows, Android, and more on your iPhone and iPad. More information at https://getutm.app/

Features

• 30+ processors supported including x86_64, ARM64, and RISC-V thanks to qemu as a backend
• Fast native graphics through para-virtualization thanks to SPICE
• JIT based acceleration using qemu TCG
• Frontend designed from scratch for iOS11+ using the latest and greatest APIs
• Create, manage, run VMs directly from your device

apps.name: Dolphin iOS
apps.subtitle: Your favorite GameCube and Wii games, now on iOS.
apps.localizedDescription: Basic stuff right now. Very much still a proof of concept on Jailed devices.

apps.name: unc0ver
apps.subtitle: The most advanced jailbreak tool.
apps.versionDescription:
Made the following changes for the substitute code substitutor:

• Bumped version to 4.3.1 due to a github bug causing an older file to be temporarily available
• Add support for rebooting the userspace for the first time in a jailbreak
• Add support for injecting to the entire userspace
• Add support for looking up or registering services from the sandbox with the cy: prefix for developers
• Reboot the userspace after jailbreaking
• Make major design changes to preserve stock system performance
• Fix random reboots, freezes, memory issues and any known problem that affected system services or apps
• Fix persistent software update blocker on iOS 13 (Works in the jailed state too)
• Fix a design problem that affected the Succession restore tool
• Automatically re-enable software updates when restoring RootFS
apps.localizedDescription:
unc0ver is a jailbreak, which means that you can have the freedom to do whatever you would like to do to your iOS device. Allowing you to change what you want and operate within your purview, unc0ver unlocks the true power of your iDevice.

Compatibility:
unc0ver supports iOS 11.0 through to iOS 13.3 (Excluding 12.3-12.3.2).

Stability:
Utilizing the latest stable APT and Mobile Substrate, stability is guaranteed.

apps.name: iTorrent
apps.subtitle: Straightforward iOS torrent client app
apps.versionDescription:
Fixed:

• Background mode not work if zero speed limit disabled

What's new:

• Added https protocol support for trackers!
• FTP server replaced by WebDAV, file sharing is now possible through a web browser
• Added background stop when downloading at zero speed
• Clicking on a notification now opens a specific window
• UI improvements
apps.localizedDescription:
iTorrent is an ordinary torrent client for iOS with Files app support.

What can this app do:

• Download in the background
• Sequential download (use VLC to watch films while loading)
• Add torrent files from Share menu (Safari and other apps)
• Add magnet links directly from Safari
• Store files in Files app (iOS 11+)
• File sharing directly from app
• Download torrent by link
• Download torrent by magnet
• Send notification on torrent downloaded
• FTP Server (unstable)
• Select files to download or not
• Change UI to dark theme

Now supporting these localizations:
• English
• Russian

apps.name: AltStore Beta
apps.subtitle: An alternative App Store for iOS.
apps.versionDescription:
** Requires latest AltServer beta to fully work. Download from https://altstore.io/altserver/beta **

The next big beta feature is here: AltStore now supports 3rd party app sources! Add sources in the Browse tab to expand the number of apps available to download through AltStore.

NEW FEATURES
• Initial support for 3rd party sources
• Activate and deactivate apps via drag & drop
• Option to remove app extensions from apps to save active app slots

BUG FIXES
• Fixes issue causing .ipa files to appear disabled in document picker
• Fixes issue causing refreshing to sometimes not finish when using older AltServer
• Fixes "invalid app group" error when installing apps
• Removes cached apps after they have been uninstalled
• Fixes peek & pop on iOS 12

PREVIOUS BETA
• Adds support for activating/deactivating apps to stay under iOS 13.3.1 active app limit
• Significantly improves performance when refreshing apps
• Improves error messages when refreshing apps
• Improves stability when refreshing apps over WiFi

NOTE: Support for 3rd party sources will be disabled in public versions of AltStore until it is finished.
apps.localizedDescription:
AltStore is an alternative app store for non-jailbroken devices. 

This beta release of AltStore allows you to install Delta as well as any app (.ipa) directly from the Files app.

permissions.usageDescription: AltStore periodically refreshes apps in the background to prevent them from expiring.
Allows AltStore to run longer than 30 seconds when refreshing apps in background.

apps.name: Delta Beta
apps.subtitle: Classic games in your pocket.
apps.versionDescription:
GENERAL
• Replaces 3D Touch peek/pop with iOS 13 context menus

CONTROLLER SKINS
• Brand new Nintendo DS controller skin
• New Quick Save, Quick Load, and Fast Forward inputs for controller skins
• Apply video filters with controller skins
• Assign controller skins to individual games
apps.localizedDescription:
The next console for Delta is coming: this beta version of Delta brings support for playing DS games!

DS support currently includes:
• Playing DS games
• Save States
• Hold Button

Features I'm still working on:
• Fast Forward
• Cheats
• Controller skin (using placeholder controller skin for now)

Please report any issues you find to support@altstore.io. Thanks!

permissions.usageDescription: Allows Delta to use images from your Photo Library as game artwork.

apps.name: Clip
apps.subtitle: Manage your clipboard history with ease.
apps.versionDescription:
• Disables notification vibration when sound is disabled for notifications.

Assuming all goes well, this should be the final beta before the public launch! Please report any last minute bugs you find to support@altstore.io.
apps.localizedDescription:
Clip is a simple clipboard manager for iOS. 

Unlike other clipboard managers, Clip can continue monitoring your clipboard while in the background. No longer do you need to remember to manually open or share to an app to save your clipboard; just copy and paste as you would normally do, and Clip will have your back.

In addition to background monitoring, Clip also has these features:

• Save text, URLs, and images copied to the clipboard.
• Copy, delete, or share any clippings saved to Clip.
• Customizable history limit.

Download Clip today, and never worry about losing your clipboard again!

permissions.usageDescription: Allows Clip to continuously monitor your clipboard in the background.

news.caption: Simple and straightforward torrenting for iOS.

news.caption: The most advanced jailbreak tool yet. Tap to download.
